name: Minimalist Cotton Tee
description: Soft, breathable cotton with a clean neckline and a straight hem. Built for layering or wearing solo.

name: Oversized Linen Shirt
description: Airy linen blend with a relaxed silhouette and minimalist buttons. Easy summer staple.

name: Tailored Straight Trousers
description: Sharp lines, mid-rise fit, and a subtle stretch for comfort. Office-ready without trying too hard.

name: High-Waist Wide-Leg Pants
description: High-waist cut with a wide leg and crisp drape. Looks expensive even when you’re not.

name: Ribbed Knit Top
description: Slim ribbed knit that hugs without suffocating. A basic that actually feels put together.

name: Satin Slip Dress
description: Bias-cut satin slip with adjustable straps. Minimal, sleek, and dangerously easy to style.

name: Wool Blend Coat
description: Warm wool blend coat with a structured collar and hidden closure. Winter, but make it elegant.

name: Cropped Denim Jacket
description: Cropped denim jacket with clean seams and a modern boxy fit. Works over dresses or tees.

name: Pleated Midi Skirt
description: Light pleats, mid-calf length, and a smooth waistband. Moves nicely when you walk like you own the place.

name: Relaxed Fit Hoodie
description: Relaxed hoodie with a soft interior and minimal branding. Your comfort blanket, but socially acceptable.

name: Classic Chino Shorts
description: Classic chino shorts with a tidy finish and functional pockets. Summer uniform material.

name: Structured Blazer
description: Structured blazer with a slightly oversized shoulder. Instantly upgrades any outfit.

name: Fine-Knit Sweater
description: Fine-knit sweater with a soft hand-feel and a neat cuff. Looks clean, feels cozy.

name: Leather Belt
description: Genuine leather belt with a matte buckle. The adult accessory that fixes everything.

name: Canvas Tote Bag
description: Sturdy canvas tote with reinforced handles. For books, groceries, and your entire life.

name: Ribbed Beanie
description: Ribbed beanie in a neutral shade. Warm head, calmer vibe.

name: Silk Scarf
description: Light silk scarf with subtle pattern. Tie it, wrap it, or pretend you’re in a fashion editorial.

name: Puffer Vest
description: Lightweight puffer vest with easy layering fit. Warm core, free arms.

name: Cardigan with Buttons
description: Buttoned cardigan with a relaxed fit and tidy neckline. The ‘I tried’ layer.

name: Straight-Leg Jeans
description: Straight-leg jeans with a mid-rise waist and clean wash. Reliable, timeless, and forgiving.
